name: Saylani Welfare Trust Usa
mission: Saylani Welfare International Trust has been working since 1999 to improve the conditions of the less privileged, helpless, and handicapped individuals ...
zakatClaimEvidence: The Saylani Welfare Trust USA donation page lists "Sadqah & Zakat" as a donation option. Additionally, their FAQ section includes the question, "Can I pay my zakat donation or only sadqa (non-zakat) donaitons are accepted?" While a specific project (IT Park) explicitly states that zakat will not be accepted for it, this implies that zakat is accepted for other eligible projects. (Source: https://www.saylaniwelfare.com/donate)

dimension_explanations.alignment: Saylani Welfare Trust USA shows high alignment for donors seeking urgent humanitarian causes, specifically within the Muslim community as a Zakat-eligible entity [3]. Its long-standing mission since 1999 to support the handicapped and less privileged establishes a proven track record of service in line with high donor expectations [1][3].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization demonstrates high impact through direct service delivery, spending 98.8% of its $1,727,397 revenue directly on programs like the Saylani Dastarkhwan food service and medical clinics [1][2]. With a fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised, the charity maximizes the utility of every donation to serve its beneficiaries [2].

The organization operates with a high degree of financial efficiency, reporting total revenue of $1,727,397 while maintaining a Charity Navigator score of 90.5/100 [1][2].

Operations show a <cite id="2">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite>, indicating minimal overhead costs.

strengths_deep_dive: Saylani Welfare Trust USA distinguishes itself through its lean operational model. With <cite id="1">total revenue of $1,727,397</cite>, the organization manages to direct an extraordinary amount to its core mission, evidenced by its <cite id="1">98.8% program expense ratio</cite>. This is significantly higher than the peer median of 89.6%. Additionally, its <cite id="2">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite> highlights a commitment to maximizing donor contributions for direct aid.
rich_narrative.summary: Saylani Welfare Trust USA provides critical humanitarian relief and medical services to the less privileged, focusing primarily on Pakistan. The organization operates with exceptional financial efficiency, reporting <cite id="1">total revenue of $1,727,397</cite> in 2023. It directs nearly all resources to its mission, maintaining a <cite id="1">98.8% program expense ratio</cite>. Furthermore, the charity demonstrates remarkable cost-effectiveness with a <cite id="2">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite>. Donors can give with confidence as the organization holds a <cite id="2">90.5/100 overall score from Charity Navigator</cite> and a Gold Seal of Transparency from Candid. For Muslim donors, the organization's programs are <cite id="3">zakat-eligible</cite>, serving categories such as fuqara and masakin through direct service delivery.
